settings.heading: A BEAUTIFUL YOU, INSIDE AND OUT
settings.title: Loss of Facial Volume
settings.body: One of the greatest marks of youth is the round curve of a structured face. In our prime years, youthful facial contours are heart-shaped. Then, as middle age begins, that shape becomes more square with downward shifting tissues. Facial volume at the temples, around the eyes, surrounding the cheeks, around the mouth, and along the jawline disappear, leaving us looking gaunt or even haggard. At Balanced Aesthetics Medspa, we can preserve the vital volume of youth with dermal fillers.

settings.text: Most people looking to shave years off their appearance or enhance structure and volume to their face are good candidates for dermal fillers. Not only is the gel made of a substance naturally found in the body to minimize the chance of adverse reactions, but the injection itself also contains lidocaine to ease any discomfort clients feel at the time of treatment. If you’re unsure which JUVÉDERM® filler would best suit your aesthetic goals, schedule a complimentary consultation with Balanced Aesthetics today.

Lost facial volume doesn’t stand a chance against the skill and experience of your Balanced Aesthetics expert injector. Because the gel is what provides the volume, your results are immediately visible. It may take a week or two for your tissues to fully settle, but depending on the dermal filler you’ve chosen, you should have youthful contours and good hydration for up to 1-2 years. Many clients start dermal filler treatments early to prevent the creep of age before it takes hold.

settings.question: What Causes Facial Volume Loss?
settings.answer: The skin’s most important support is a network of collagen fibers entwined to keep skin smooth and firm. However, time and age take their toll on this network. Existing fibers weaken and break, and new fibers are slow to replace them. As a result, the skin begins to sag, and with it, the tissues under them. The jawline develops jowls while hollows form at the temples, beneath the eyes, and around the cheeks. Skin becomes thinner and more prone to lines and wrinkles, deepening facial folds, and an overall weathered appearance.

settings.question: What Treatments Are There for Facial Volume Loss?
settings.answer:
Hydration is one of the ways skin maintains its firm youthfulness. Collagen fibers in well-hydrated skin are less likely to break or become damaged, and skin retains its youthful thickness, so wrinkles are slower to develop. The primary vehicle of skin hydration is hyaluronic acid, which gives skin nourishment it needs to stay supple. The main ingredient in the JUVÉDERM® Family of Dermal Fillers is hyaluronic acid gel. With an exciting lineup of fillers with different consistencies, cohesiveness, and spreadability for nearly any facial rejuvenation purpose, JUVÉDERM® can restore lost facial volume and bring back your youthful contours while hydrating your skin.

JUVÉDERM® Ultra XC and Ultra Plus XC are specifically formulated to fill in deepening nasolabial folds (the lines between the nose and mouth that are sometimes called “parentheses”) and add or restore volume to the lips. The hydration from the gel also prevents new lines from forming around the mouth and lasts 6-months to 1 year in most people.

JUVÉDERM® Volbella™ XC is designed for delicate tissues under the eyes, with a thinner gel consistency and spreadability that hydrates just as well as its thicker, more cohesive counterparts. Under-eye hollows disappear, and you get a refreshed, bright-eyed renewal in just minutes.

JUVÉDERM® Voluma™ XC is a more robust formula designed to restore cheekbones, the chin, and jawline to their structured, youthful glory. Because this gel is more cohesive, there’s less chance of the gel migrating, so it stays right where your Balanced Aesthetics expert injects it for up to 2 years.

settings.question: What is the Treatment Like?
settings.answer: No matter which dermal filler you choose, your appointment is quick, usually taking about 30-45 minutes. Because of the lidocaine in the JUVÉDERM® syringes, each injection pinches less than the one before, and you’re quickly back to your usual routine. Most patients only experience mild side effects, such as injection site tenderness or redness. These subside quickly and on their own.

settings.text: If you’re unhappy with shifting tissues, hollow areas on your face, or the lack of suppleness of your skin, Balanced Aesthetics can bring back your youthful face shape and hydration levels with JUVÉDERM® fillers. They’ve helped millions of people define their appearance on their terms, and they can help you, too.
